description.p1: I'm a developer focused on creating modern and well-functioning web applications. My journey started with a simple HTML page, and since then, I've been constantly learning, trying new things, and pushing myself to improve and build cool stuff.
description.p3: . I started as a junior dev and have grown a lot through hands-on experience and tough challenges.
description.p4: Here's my current favorite tech stack:

react.title: React
react.description: my go-to for building interactive, component driven UIs.

typescript.title: Typescript
typescript.description: I can't imagine working without it. The DX is unmatched.

nextjs.title: Next.js
nextjs.description: one of my favorites, thanks to static generation, dynamic routing, and built-in APIs.

tailwindcss.title: Tailwind
tailwindcss.description: I've tried every CSS approach, and Tailwind just works and scales as I build.

tanstack_query.title: TanStack Query
tanstack_query.description: the best tool for handling data fetching.

vite.title: Vite
vite.description: I love building SPAs with it. It makes development fast and smooth.

zustand.title: Zustand
zustand.description: the simplest way to manage state without unnecessary complexity.

cypress.title: Cypress
cypress.description: makes testing fun. Watching tests run in real time is incredibly satisfying.

vitest.title: Vitest
vitest.description: simple, fast, and a joy to use.

rondo.title: Frontend Developer · Rondo
rondo.description: Design and develop key parts of the user interface, focusing on performance and user experience. Collaborate with designers, backend engineers, and product managers to deliver thoughtful, high-quality solutions that support both users and business goals.

iq_group.title: Frontend Developer · IQ Group
iq_group.description: Developed the frontend for an IQ testing web app, prioritizing performance, usability, and the clear presentation of intricate testing processes. Delivered the project end-to-end in close collaboration with designers and backend developers.

the_cabs.title: The Cabs
the_cabs.description: Web app for discovering and booking properties, covering everything from browsing listings and managing reservations to completing the full booking process.

the_cabs_admin.title: The Cabs Admin
the_cabs_admin.description: Admin app for The Cabs, built to manage properties, bookings, guests, and admin users. View booking statistics and track upcoming reservations.

calendar.title: Calendar
calendar.description: Simple calendar app. Users can create, update, and delete events through a clean and intuitive interface.

countries.title: Countries
countries.description: Web app for exploring countries. Browse, search, and filter by region, and see details about each country, including capital, currencies, languages, and more.

forkify.title: Forkify
forkify.description: Recipe app for searching, viewing, and saving favorite meals. Explore recipes by name and view cooking details.

metadata.title: Martin Kamír
metadata.description: Martin Kamír is a frontend developer who builds responsive, type-safe, and high-performance web applications with a focus on clean code, seamless user experiences, and scalable solutions.
